appNotInstalledError.title: App not installed
appNotInstalledError.body: Please install the app you'd like to share with.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
errors.emailClient: We're sorry but we can't find this devices email client, email <email> from a web browser instead.
errors.phoneCall: We're sorry but this device doesn't support phone calls, please ring 0330 100 7676 from your mobile phone or landline instead.

firstPage.title: Unlock More Requests
firstPage.description: Earn requests by inviting your friends or upgrade to PRO to get unlimited access.

notify.shared: Invite sent! You will get coins as soon as a friend installs the app
